text: Shadows and Fog is a 1991 American mystery comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and also starring Kathy Bates, Jodie Foster, John Cusack, Mia Farrow, Donald Pleasence, John C. Reilly, Madonna, John Malkovich, Fred Gwynne, Lily Tomlin. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen
title: Shadows and Fog
